subject: Partner with Team53
description_text:
My name is Justin Laxton with Team53 Racing. We’re a family-based racing team competing in both Late Model and karting divisions, with a strong presence on YouTube, social media, and at regional tracks across Wisconsin.

I’m reaching out to explore a potential sponsorship partnership for our upcoming season. We’ve put together a detailed proposal that outlines our audience reach, marketing opportunities, and the value we can provide to your brand both on and off the track.

View the Proposal Here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/13rBs3BaYXV7TsY3VZi7-CnYhpqyXKY_U/view?usp=sharing

I’d love the chance to discuss how we could collaborate and help promote your business through racing, events, and digital content exposure.

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to connecting with you.

Best regards,
Justin Laxton
Team53 Racing
